summary: Gregory Dale Bear  is an American science fiction author.
full_text: Gregory Dale "Greg" Bear  is an American writer best known for science fiction. His work has covered themes of galactic conflict , artificial universes , consciousness and cultural practices , and accelerated evolution . His most recent work is the Forerunner Trilogy, written in the Halo universe. Greg Bear has written 44 books in total. Greg Bear was also one of the five co-founders of the San Diego Comic-Con.
title: Greg Bear
